column4: I moved all my photos that F-Spot had in ~/Photos to /var/photos. However, now when I startup F-Spot, it only finds the thumbnails, not the regular size image.  How do I tell F-Spot to find where I've put the photos now?
Is there any replacement for F-Spot available?  That program really leaves a lot to be desired.
it's like iPhoto, or Picasa for Linux.  Only it's really lacking with some features.
